name: Pill-Box
overview: A game inspired by Dr. Mario and published in 64'er 1994/12. a hot game about pills and germs! Reaction and combination skills are in demand. Dexterity and a bit of strategy are required to hunt down insidious viruses with pills in our game. The game "Pill-Box" is based on a Tetris-like principle and also creates similarly long game sessions in front of the monitor.
